feed.title: Countly Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Countly: Countly Version 24.05.36
entry.content: Features: - [plugins] Add configuration warning tags to settings UI

entry.title: New release for Countly: Countly Version 24.10.12
entry.content: Features: - [core] Use correct rights validation for loyality - [plugins] Add configuration warning tags to settings UI

entry.title: New release for Countly: Countly Version 25.03.12
entry.content:
Features: - [plugins] Add configuration warning tags to settings UI - [white-labeling] Add sidebar footer label setting to white labeling

Fixes: - [core] Use correct rights validation for loyality - [crashes] Fix free session for home widget - [crashes] Fix trend and change calculation for crash stats - [crashes] Use na for free session and free user when there's no data - [push] Show segmentation, geo and cohorts related components in push drawer on editing draft.

Enterprise Fixes: - [ldap] Error handling in ldap plugin on search error - [license] Display notification for non global admin user - [users] Load table data from report if user table calculation goes to report manager

Dependencies: - Bump mongodb from 6.17.0 to 6.18.0 - Bump puppeteer from 24.14.0 to 24.15.0 - Bump supertest from 7.1.3 to 7.1.4

entry.title: New release for Countly: Countly Version 25.03.13
entry.content:
Features: - [remote-config] Enable comparing newer/older app version in conditions

Fixes: - [remote-config] Fix condition matching with compound conditions

Enterprise Fixes: - [flows] Showing correct state for disabled flows - [surveys] Move "not likely" label next to 0 on mobile screens

entry.title: New release for Countly: Countly Version 25.03.14
entry.content:
Fixes: - [dashboard] Localized missing string in the dashboard - [localization] Added French translations

Enterprise Fixes: - [active_directory] Fix for body parser empty request body issue

Dependencies: - Bump lint-staged from 16.1.2 to 16.1.4
